General.Name: Tipco Asphalt Public Company Limited
General.Description: Tipco Asphalt Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and distribution of asphalt and petroleum products in Thailand and internationally. It operates through Manufacturing and Trading; and Construction Business segments. The company offers asphalt concrete products. It also engages in shipping management and agency; distribution of machine, materials, and tools; road rehabilitation services; and marine transportation activities, as well as sale of construction materials and related services. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
